plot: A young man with a rare medical condition boards himself up in his apartment as he deals with himself, his cat, and his self conscience in the form of his ex-boyfriend.
plot_es: A young man with a rare medical condition boards himself up in his apartment as he deals with himself, his cat, and his self conscience in the form of his ex-boyfriend.
plot_en: A young man with a rare medical condition boards himself up in his apartment as he deals with himself, his cat, and his self conscience in the form of his ex-boyfriend.
